1. Alice is offering me $400,000, keeping $600,000 for herself

Given that Alice faces a much steeper depreciation (20% vs my 5%), I have leverage to get a better deal. If I reject and make a counter-offer in round 2, Alice will be more pressured to accept due to her higher depreciation rate.
